hero.title: WE LOOK FOR UNUSED PROPERTIES AND TRANSFORM THEM INTO WORK SPACES
hero.titleMovile: WE LOOK FOR UNUSED PROPERTIES AND TRANSFORM THEM INTO WORK SPACES

video.title: We manage all types of unused properties
video.description: Have you not been able to rent your property? We take care of managing your property with flexible and short-term contracts. Are you looking for a flexible work space? We have spaces in excellent locations for entrepreneurs and artists.

hero_2.title: FIND A FLEXIBLE SPACE FOR YOUR BUSINESS

details.title: Large organizations trust us
details.description: We manage all types of real estate during the period prior to demolition, with flexible and short-term contracts. In this way we generate valor from a frozen resource.

owners.title: We manage all types of unused properties
owners.subtitle: Have you not been able to rent your property? We take care of managing your property with flexible and short-term contracts. In this way we generate VALUE from a frozen resource.
owners.description_1: Take care of and avoid misuse of the property: access by squatters or criminals to steal from neighbors (focus of crime), etc.
owners.description_2: Generate an extra monthly monetary income for the property owner from a frozen resource.
owners.description_3: Provide an economic opportunity for spaces for entrepreneurs and art development centers in various parts of the capital.

createResult.title: The approximate rental value for your property is

createResult.description_2: and the data delivered, in addition to a review of the
createResult.description_3: property conditions and feasibility of use
createResult.confirm: confirm the rental value through a technical visit by our inspectors

schedule.title: Select the date for your visit

scheduleResult.title: All ready!
scheduleResult.descriprion: You will receive a visit from our inspector on the day
scheduleResult.vistit: The inspector will take photos to later make the lease offer. If you accept it, we will contact you to sign a contract and give you access to your property's control panel.

details.title: Flexible use spaces with simple and short-term contracts
details.description: Do you have an SME and need a flexible space to work? Are you an artist and need a workshop?
This property is located in downtown Providencia. The minimum rental terms are 3 months and the use of machinery or noisy work is not allowed.
